title: Gelarmony - Marcantonio Colonna
description: Sicilian gelateria with multiple locations. In the back of the shop you will find many vegan gelato with flavors like cinnamon, pistachio, walnut. Has soy cream as topping, vegan cones. In the front of the shop are Sicilian granita and confectionary specialties like cannoli and cassata. Only a few stool seating in the back counter. Directions: Located on the west side of the Tiber River, northeast of the Vatican, a few blocks south of the Lepanto metro stop.
